pe1:31.2: yani nava padani kusalani, ayam dukkhanirodhagamini patipada.
pe1:31.3: Iti samudayassa dukkham phalam, dukkhanirodhagaminiya patipadaya nirodham phalam.

pe1:32.2: Ya evam sabbesam saccanam iti ekamekam saccam aparimanehi akkharapadabyanjanaakaraniruttiniddesehi pariyesitabbam, tanca byanjanam atthaputhuttena pana attheva byanjanaputhuttena.
pe1:33.1: Yo hi koci samano va brahmano va evam vadeyya “aham idam dukkham paccakkhaya annam dukkham pannapessami”ti tassa tam vacavatthukamevassa pucchito ca na sampayissati.
pe1:33.3: Yanca rattim bhagava abhisambuddho, yanca rattim anupadaya parinibbuto, etthantare yam kinci bhagavata bhasitam suttam geyyam veyyakaranam gatha udanam itivuttakam jatakam abbhutadhammam vedallam, sabbam tam dhammacakkam pavattitam.
pe1:33.4: Na kinci buddhanam bhagavantanam dhammadesanaya dhammacakkato bahiddha, tassa sabbam suttam ariyadhammesu pariyesitabbam.
pe1:33.5: Tattha parigganhanaya alokasabhani cattari ariyasaccani thavarani imani.
pe1:34.2: Jati jara byadhi maranam sankhittena pancupadanakkhandha dukkha.
pe1:34.3: Tatthayam lakkhananiddeso, patubhavalakkhana jati, paripakalakkhana jara, dukkhadukkhatalakkhano byadhi, cutilakkhanam maranam, piyavippayogaviparinamaparitapanalakkhano soko, lalappanalakkhano paridevo, kayasampilanalakkhanam dukkham, cittasampilanalakkhanam domanassam, kilesaparidahanalakkhano upayaso, amanapasamodhanalakkhano appiyasampayogo, manapavinabhavalakkhano piyavippayogo, adhippayavivattanalakkhano alabho, aparinnalakkhana pancupadanakkhandha, paripakacutilakkhanam jaramaranam, patubhavacutilakkhanam cutopapatti, patisandhinibbattanalakkhano samudayo, samudayaparijahanalakkhano nirodho, anusayasamucchedalakkhano maggo.
pe1:34.4: Byadhilakkhanam dukkham, sanjananalakkhano samudayo, niyyanikalakkhano maggo, santilakkhano nirodho.
pe1:34.5: Appatisandhibhavanirodhalakkhana anupadisesa nibbanadhatu, dukkhanca samudayo ca, dukkhanca nirodho ca, dukkhanca maggo ca, samudayo ca dukkhanca, samudayo ca nirodho ca, samudayo ca maggo ca, nirodho ca samudayo ca, nirodho ca dukkhanca, nirodho ca maggo ca, maggo ca nirodho ca, maggo ca samudayo ca, maggo ca dukkhanca.

pe1:136.2: Yo ca anissayo, ya ca anati, ayam maggo.
pe1:136.3: Ya agatigati na hoti cutupapato ca yo esevanto dukkhassati, ayam nirodho.
pe1:136.7: Ekarasaupanissaya vimuttiyo yava upanissayaupasampada upatthitakayagatasatissa viharati.
pe1:136.8: Silasamvaro sosaniyo hoti, yanca vimuttinanadassanam, ayam maggo.

pe1:139.5: Tassa atthappatisamvedissa pamojjam jayati, pamuditassa piti jayati, yava nibbindanto virajjati, ayam maggo.
pe1:139.8: Imani dve saccani nirodho ca maggo ca.
pe1:140.2: Imehi sadharanehi suttehi yathanikkhittehi pativedhato ca lakkhanato ca otaretva annani suttani niddisitabbani aparihayantena.
pe1:140.4: Ime ca sadharana dasa parivaddhaka eko ca catukko niddeso sadharano.
pe1:140.6: Ekam panca cha ca savekadeso sabbam.
pe1:140.7: Ime dve parivajjana purimaka ca dasa.
pe1:140.9: Ettavata sabbam suttam natthi, tam byakaranam va gatha viya.
pe1:140.10: Imehi dvadasahi parivaddhakehi na otaritum appamattena pariyesitva niddisitabba.
pe1:141.2: Sabbam dukkham sattahi padehi samosaranam gacchati.
pe1:141.4: Appiyasampayogo ca piyavippayogo ca, imehi dvihi padehi sabbam dukkham niddisitabbam.
pe1:141.7: Tena vuccati “kayikam dukkham cetasikance”ti, natthi tam dukkham na kayikam va na cetasikam, sabbam dukkham dvihi dukkhehi niddisitabbam kayikena ca cetasikena ca.
pe1:141.8: Tihi dukkhatahi sangahitam dukkhadukkhataya sankharadukkhataya viparinamadukkhataya.
pe1:141.9: Iti tam sabbam dukkham tihi dukkhatahi sangahitam.
pe1:142.6: Iti yapi bhavagatisu hinata ca panitata ca, yapi tihi dukkhatahi sangahita, yopi dvihi mulehi samudanito avijjaya nivutassa bhavatanhasamyuttassa savinnanako kayo, sopi tihi dukkhatahi sangahito.
pe1:143.3: Eko vipallaso tini niddisiyati, cattari vipallasavatthuni.
pe1:143.5: Yo viparitaggaho patikkhepena, otaranam yatha “anicce niccam”iti viparitam ganhati.
pe1:143.14: Tattha dosassa akusalamulassa tini micchattani phalam—
pe1:143.20: Evam akusalam sahetu sappaccayam vipallasa ca paccayo, akusalamulani sahetu eteyeva patipakkhena anuna anadhika dvihi paccayehi niddisitabba.
pe1:143.21: Nirodhe ca magge ca vipallasamupadaya parato patipakkhena catasso.
